text: Ilir Qorri (born 7 November 1975) is an Albanian retired football player who started his career as a defender but also played as a striker for a number of Albanian Superliga sides including KF Elbasani and Dinamo Tirana.Footballdatabase profileDinamo comeback stuns hosts == Honours == ===Club=== ;Dinamo Tirana * Albanian Superliga (1): 2001–02 * Albanian Cup (1): 2002–03 ;KF Elbasani * Albanian Superliga (1): 2005–06 ==References== Category:1975 births Category:Living people Category:Footballers from Elbasan Category:Albanian footballers Category:Association football defenders Category:Association football forwards Category:KF Elbasani players Category:KF Bylis Ballsh players Category:FK Dinamo Tirana players Category:Khazar Lankaran FK players Category:KS Shkumbini Peqin players Category:KF Teuta Durrës players Category:Albanian Superliga players Category:Albanian expatriate footballers Category:Expatriate footballers in Azerbaijan Category:Albanian expatriate sportspeople in Azerbaijan
title: Ilir Qorri
